m_szDocSumamry: November 4th, 2012 by Guest Contributor     By Courtney Lane of PennFuture Energy Center (reposted by request) Exelon has changed its tune on the federal Production Tax Credit (PTC) for wind energy and has begun to lobby against its extension. Most recently, the company issued  a report  attacking the subsidy. The truth behind this about-face is not something Exelon wants the public to know. Exelon owns the country’s largest commercial nuclear fleet, and the profitability of these plants depends primarily on the price of power.
